example.description: This example updates the description for the specified AMI.

example.code: PS C:\> Edit-EC2ImageAttribute -ImageId ami-12345678 -Attribute launchPermission -OperationType add -UserGroup all
example.description: This example makes the AMI public (for example, so any AWS account can use it).

example.code: PS C:\> Edit-EC2ImageAttribute -ImageId ami-12345678 -Attribute launchPermission -OperationType remove -UserGroup all
example.description: This example makes the AMI private (for example, so that only you as the owner can use it).

example.code: PS C:\> Edit-EC2ImageAttribute -ImageId ami-12345678 -Attribute launchPermission -OperationType add -UserId 111122223333
example.description: This example grants launch permission to the specified AWS account.

example.code: PS C:\> Edit-EC2ImageAttribute -ImageId ami-12345678 -Attribute launchPermission -OperationType remove -UserId 111122223333
example.description: This example removes launch permission from the specified AWS account.
